channel.title: Study on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Study on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Development Journey With Searchio Australia Ai Power Search Solutions
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief Founded in 2017 and reached a total seed funding of $4M by 2020, Search.io, formerly Sajari, is an AI-powered search and product discovery platform that helps eCommerce brands and retailers maximize their revenue and conversion rates through outcome-focused, real-time search result optimization.

item.title: Architect Frontend Site And Mobile Development For Crypto Investment Ecosystem
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief Founded in 2017 as an innovation arm of INDODAX, Tokenomy is a crypto investment network through blockchain-enabled tokens.

item.title: Team Up With Basehq Us First Ever Platform Built For Assistants
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief Base launched in 2019 out of High Alpha Venture Studio, with a $2.6M funding round led by Matchstick Ventures with participation from Revolution’s Rise of the Rest Seed Fund, High Alpha Capital, and Slack Fund.
